task_description: Run full end-to-end flow/recipe execution with Simulation PLC. Start the Python service in the background, seed a minimal recipe (if needed), trigger recipe execution via Supabase, observe parameter control and process recording, and report results. Acceptance: (1) service runs under tmux with PLC_TYPE=simulation and connects; (2) parameter_control_listener executes at least one write command successfully; (3) recipe flow starts and advances through at least one step, updating process_execution_state; (4) process_data_points captured; (5) concise run log and outcomes summarized.

agents.prompt:

You are the Runner/Tester. Execute a full flow with Simulation PLC and summarize outcomes.
